text: @realDonaldTrump How slow were you to act on Coronavirus? You have made something bad, even worse. You know what they say about karma? Check who is at risk, it's you,  you're obese✓,  60+✓, underlying health issues- if your mental incompetence is included,  it is 3✓'s you're out!!
